meaning_str.bing:
n. 体育运动；芽变；消遣；（某项）体育运动
v. 夸示；嬉戏；得意地穿戴；故意显示
adj. 运动(比赛)用的
网络. 运动模式；运动会；运动系列

体育运动；芽变；消遣；（某项）体育运动
夸示；嬉戏；得意地穿戴；故意显示
运动模式；运动会；运动系列

运动；体育运动；娱乐；玩耍；消遣；乐趣；愉悦；玩笑对象；笑柄；突变体；芽变；老兄；好伙伴；哥们儿
展示；炫耀；得意地佩戴；穿戴；嬉戏；（动植物）变异；突变

1.en: Unfortunately, though, injuries seem to be an unavoidable part of the sport.
1.cn: 不幸的是，尽管这些伤害看起来是运动中不可避免的一部分。

2.en: "Calciopoli shock: Palazzi sinks Inter" said the front-page headline of Tuesday's Gazzetta dello Sport.
2.cn: “电话门事件的冲击：帕拉奇搞垮国际米兰”是周二《米兰体育报》的头条标题。

3.en: His unwillingness to think of a non-sport career caught up with him.
3.cn: 他不愿考虑运动之外的职业给他带来不幸。

0.en: Kite fighting? Oh, yeah. It's an extremely competitive, cutthroat sport.
0.cn: 斗风筝？对，一项极具竞争性和激烈性的运动。

1.en: Nobody gets out of this. World's worst sport, world's worst players of it.
1.cn: 没人逃得过，世界上最糟糕的运动，世界上最糟糕的运动员。

2.en: Here, why don't you put these on while I find a shirt and a sport coat that match. Great, I'll be right back.
2.cn: 你穿上这个试试，我再看看有没有合适的T恤和运动外衣。好，我马上回来。

3.en: Sport has a wonderful way of bringing together people and nations, as we saw this year in Glasgow when over 70 countries took part in the Commonwealth Games.
3.cn: 体育自有将民族国家聚到一起的妙法，正如今年70多个国家参加了在格拉斯哥举办的英联邦运动会。

5.en: What the hell are you doing, old sport?
5.cn: 你他妈的在干嘛，老伙计？

6.en: I don't think there's much gas, old sport.
6.cn: 汽油恐怕不多了，老伙计。

7.en: I hope the weather stays fine for your sport.
7.cn: 我希望天气为你的捕猎保持晴朗。

8.en: What about it, old sport? Don't you call me "Old sport."
8.cn: 那又怎样呢，老伙计？别叫我老伙计。

9.en: They hit us so hard. It's all right, baseball's our sport anyway.
9.cn: 他们深深地伤害了我。没关系啦，反正我们要打棒球了。

10.en: You must be crazy. No, old sport. No, you see, she never loved you.
10.cn: 你疯了吧。没有，老伙计，她从没爱过你。

11.en: Are you sure? What's his name? Some sort of sport fish or something.
11.cn: 它是什么鱼来着? 一种观赏鱼。

12.en: Well, look here, old sport. You don't make much money, do you? Not really.
12.cn: 听我说，老伙计，你赚的钱不多吧，对吗？不太多。

13.en: Dude, you're not even man enough to order the channel that carries the sport.

14.en: You know, the success of British sport rests on your shoulders now. No pressure.
14.cn: 要知道，英国的体育发展就靠你了。别有压力。

15.en: They test me every now and then. I think they enjoy the sport of it. This time, they sent you.
15.cn: 他们经常给我出难题，我觉得他们很享受其中的乐趣，这次他们派了你来。

16.en: You understand what I'm saying, right? You do sell bonds, don't you, old sport? I'm trying to.
16.cn: 你知道我在说什么，对吧？你是卖债券的，是吧，老伙计？我正在努力卖。

17.en: Peppa and her family are watching sport on television. It's a long jump. It's a new world record.
17.cn: 佩奇和他的家人在看电视里的体育节目。跳的可真远啊。这是一个新的世界记录。

18.en: What do you say we go to Coney Island, old sport? We could take my car. Oh, it's too late tonight.
18.cn: 你说我们去科尼岛怎么样，老伙计？可以坐我的车去。今天太晚了。

19.en: The Defiler killed most of my family, but some he enslaved. Not for work, you understand, but for sport.
19.cn: 亵渎者几乎杀光了我的家人，只留了几个做奴隶，不是做苦力，明白吗？是为了娱乐。
